data.title: Trains Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central from €5.33
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central in 19m. Compare prices, view live journey times & book cheap train tickets for Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central.
data.text:
Want to travel from Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central by train? Start your journey with us.

The train from Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central usually takes 23 minutes on average to travel 5 miles (8 km), although the quickest services can take as little as 19 minutes. You can expect to find 37 trains per day running on this popular route. Good news! There are direct trains available to Glasgow Central, so you can just make yourself comfortable as soon as you board the train and just enjoy the journey. All or part of your journey will be served by ScotRail, as they are the main operator of trains on this route.

You can save money on train tickets from Whitecraigs to Glasgow Central if you book in advance, as tickets usually start from €5.33. You can also travel Off-Peak – tickets are usually cheaper during quieter times on weekdays and weekends – or get a Railcard and save up to 1/3 on eligible journeys for a whole year. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.

If you want to know more about the journey, scroll up for timetables and live train times, or keep reading for tips on finding cheap tickets and FAQs. Want to go straight to booking? Start a search with us today!
